entry.title: Re @0xPolygon @zksync 4/4 @Scroll_ZKP also launched the first of its kind zkEVM-based zkRollup. In a collaboration between the @PrivacyScaling at Ethe...
entry.summary: Re @0xPolygon @zksync 4/4 @Scroll_ZKP also launched the first of its kind zkEVM-based zkRollup. In a collaboration between the @PrivacyScaling at Ethereum's foundation. Scroll 📜: After over a year of building our zkEVM-based zkRollup in close collaboration with the @PrivacyScaling group at the Ethereum Foundation, we are releasing the pre-alpha version of Scroll for external testers! 📜 https://mirror.xyz/scroll.eth/XQyXDgyxoefag6hcBgGJFz8qrb10rmSU-zUBvY3Q9_A

entry.title: Re @0xPolygon 3/4 @zksync has also announced its native zkEVM rollup - called zkSync 2.0 which will be live on main net in the next 100 days
entry.summary: Re @0xPolygon 3/4 @zksync has also announced its native zkEVM rollup - called zkSync 2.0 which will be live on main net in the next 100 days zkSync: Over the last year, we've been heads down working to scale Ethereum and accelerate its adoption. Today, we’re happy to announce that zkSync 2.0 – the first zkEVM rollup – will be live on mainnet in 100 days. Our public roadmap for the rest of the year: https://matterlabs.medium.com/100-days-to-mainnet-6f230893bd73

entry.title: Re 2/4 @0xPolygon announced Polygon #zkEVM, an EVM-equivalent ZK L2 rollup.
entry.summary: Re 2/4 @0xPolygon announced Polygon #zkEVM, an EVM-equivalent ZK L2 rollup. Polygon - MATIC 💜: We are proud to announce a giant leap forward for Ethereum scaling and ZK innovation. Introducing Polygon #zkEVM, the first EVM-equivalent ZK L2. Today we’re releasing a complete implementation, fully open-source, and we’re just getting started. [1/6]
